name: Neon Blasters Multiplayer
description:
Welcome to Neon Blasters Multiplayer Shooter 2017
* Best of online PVP shooting games 2017
* Intense multiplayer shooting combat with upto 10 players online
* Classic 2d platformer style gameplay
* Choose from various robots with tons of different guns including sniper, shotgun, bazooka and more.

UNIQUE FEATURES:
* Neon Blasters Multiplayer Shooter 2017 is an exclusive Multiplayer only PVP game
* Match up with other online players around the world
* Got interrupted when playing online? No worries, you can quickly reconnect back to your current game.
* Shooting and killing enemy players will be the key to victory
* 24/7 Support

GAME MODE:
Online Free for All Deathmatch - Be the last one standing in the multiplayer gun combat.

UNLOCKABLES AND UPGRADES:
* One of 5 stats can be upgraded in different combinations upon level up
* Various cool robots are unlocked based on what stats you upgrade

BALANCED GAMEPLAY:
* Robots, guns and blasters are all balanced for competitive multiplayer PVP combat.
* Also we will continuously keep balancing the game by buffing and nerfing robots, guns and blasters.

FUTURE EXCITEMENTS:
* More new arenas, robots and cool guns are coming soon.
* Fun modes including capture the flag and team deathmatch are coming soon.

We hope you enjoy our new multiplayer shooting game. And we’d love to hear your ideas, feedback and suggestions. Mail us - support@timeplusq.com
